attributes.action: instruct the Royal Mint to make all legal currency available to the public at face value
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Mint are currently marketing various British coins (of values up to £5) as  legal tender.. but ONLY offered for sale  at a premium (in some cases approaching 300%).  If they are indeed  'legal tender' then these coins should also be issued to the general public at face value for their stated use.. that is as legal tender to be used in  monetary transactions.
